data.name: Lemage Consulting SARL
data.shortDescription: Landing page for a Yaounde based consulting agency.
data.description: A simple landing page to quickly introduce the consulting agency and its services. There is also a contact form and a Google Maps to localize their offices.

features: A landing page with and overview of the whole site
